item.title: Aubrey add a quote by J.M. Barrie
item.description: "Life is a long lesson in humility." -- J.M. Barrie

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Gratitude is the beginning of wisdom. Stated differently, true wisdom cannot be obtained unless it is built on a foundation of true humility and gratitude." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Thomas S. Monson
item.description: "The principles of living greatly include the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and trial with humility. " -- Thomas S. Monson

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Ezra Taft Benson
item.description: "The antidote for pride is humility; meekness; submissiveness... Let us choose to be humble. We can choose to humble ourselves by conquering enmity toward our brothers and sisters, esteeming them as ourselves, and lifting them as high or higher than we are... We can choose to humble ourselves by receiving counsel and chastisement... We can choose to humble ourselves by forgiving those who have offended us... We can choose to humble ourselves by rendering selfless service... We can chose to humble ourselves by going on missions and preaching the word that can humble others... We can choose to humble ourselves by getting to the temple more frequently... We can choose to humble ourselves by confessing and forsaking our sins and being born of God... We can choose to humble ourselves by loving God, submitting our will to His, and putting Him first in our lives" -- Ezra Taft Benson

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Be grateful, be smart, be clean, be true, be humble, be prayerful." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Pooh," said Rabbit kindly, "you haven't any brain." "I know," said Pooh humbly." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "A great man is always willing to be little." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Being humble means recognizing that we are not on earth to see how important we can become, but to see how much difference we can make in the lives of others" -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by W.T. Purkiser
item.description: "Not what we say about our blessings but how we use them is the true measure of our thanksgiving" -- W.T. Purkiser

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "Anyone who imagines that bliss is normal is going to waste a lot of time running around shouting that he’s been robbed. The fact is that most putts don’t drop, most beef is tough, most children grow up to just be people, most successful marriages require a high degree of mutual toleration, most jobs are more often dull than otherwise. Life is like an old time rail journey…delays…sidetracks, smoke, dust, cinders and jolts, interspersed only occasionally by beautiful vistas and thrilling burst of speed. The trick is to thank the Lord for letting you have the ride." -- Gordon B. Hinckley

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Kristin Hannah
item.description: "As mothers and daughters, we are connected with one another. My mother is the bones of my spine, keeping me straight and true. She is my blood, making sure it runs rich and strong. She is the beating of my heart. I cannot now imagine a life without her." -- Kristin Hannah

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Marc Wambolt
item.description: "I may not always be with you But when we're far apart Remember you will be with me Right inside my heart" -- Marc Wambolt

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "This is part of what a family is about, not just love. It's knowing that your family will be there watching out for you. Nothing else will give you that. Not money. Not fame. Not work." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Robert N. Munsch
item.description: "I'll love you forever, I'll like you for always, As long as I'm living, my baby you'll be." -- Robert N. Munsch

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Angela Schwindt
item.description: "While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about." -- Angela Schwindt

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Cheryl Lacey Donovan
item.description: "Mother is a verb. It's something you do. Not just who you are." -- Cheryl Lacey Donovan

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Maureen Hawkins
item.description: "Before you were conceived, I wanted you. Before you were born, I loved you. Before you were an hour, I would die for you. This is the miracle of love." -- Maureen Hawkins

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by MG Wells
item.description: "Small Acts of Kindness are Priceless" -- MG Wells

item.title: Aubrey add a quote by Gordon B. Hinckley
item.description: "work at our responsibility as parents as if everything in life counted on it, because in fact everything in life does count on it." -- Gordon B. Hinckley
